title: 'If the problem could be the coach, I'm ready to go' - Conte questions Spurs future
description: Tottenham manager Antonio Conte has suggested he may not be the right man for Spurs after Burnley inflicted a fourth defeat in five on them.

title: Ukraine crisis: 'Everyone is scared', say families evacuated to Russia

title: Late goals give England landmark victory against Germany and clinch cup

description: Liverpool close the gap on leaders Manchester City to three points as they cruise to a sixth Premier League win in a row at Leeds United's expense.
